about_the_game:
About Game:
Bubble With Djealy is based on a character named Djealy. You’re Djealy and you need to shoot the same colored bubbles to get the highest score.
In this bubble shooting game, you’ll have five lives, so whenever you lose alive you can start again with a new life. When you use your five lives, then you need to wait or buy five new lives with 100 coins.
The game has 1150 levels. If the level is too challenging and hard to complete, you can use your coins to buy extra balls. There is an exchange bubble tab that is used to exchange the current bubble with upcoming for the smarter move.


Free Locked Booster:

There are four free locked booster tools which will be unlocked only by coins.
Super aim: This booster is used for, to aim at the exact target on the level.

Rainbow Bomb: This booster is a multiple color bubble that gets attached once you throw it, to any colored bubble and destroys chain.

Horizontal Bomb: This booster is used to destroy all the bubbles in a horizontal chain.

Circle Bomb: This is used to destroy all the bubbles in one circular chain.
Spend 100 coins to buy 5 moves & complete your mission. Fill up your level bar, See your performance. Hit the targets on time or level will revert to the top & you might skip your move.
detailed_description:
About Game:
Bubble With Djealy is based on a character named Djealy. You’re Djealy and you need to shoot the same colored bubbles to get the highest score.
In this bubble shooting game, you’ll have five lives, so whenever you lose alive you can start again with a new life. When you use your five lives, then you need to wait or buy five new lives with 100 coins.
The game has 1150 levels. If the level is too challenging and hard to complete, you can use your coins to buy extra balls. There is an exchange bubble tab that is used to exchange the current bubble with upcoming for the smarter move.


Free Locked Booster:

There are four free locked booster tools which will be unlocked only by coins.
Super aim: This booster is used for, to aim at the exact target on the level.

Rainbow Bomb: This booster is a multiple color bubble that gets attached once you throw it, to any colored bubble and destroys chain.

Horizontal Bomb: This booster is used to destroy all the bubbles in a horizontal chain.

Circle Bomb: This is used to destroy all the bubbles in one circular chain.
Spend 100 coins to buy 5 moves & complete your mission. Fill up your level bar, See your performance. Hit the targets on time or level will revert to the top & you might skip your move.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: ios 8.0
  • Processor: 2nd generation any processor
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: no need of any graphic card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: ios 8.0
  • Processor: 2nd generation any processor
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: no need of any graphic card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

name: Bubble With Djealy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 7
  • Processor: 2nd generation any processor
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: no need of any graphic card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: windows 8.1 or above
  • Processor: 3Rd generation any processor or above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: no need
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: required builtin

short_description: Bubble With Djealy Its a bubble game Shoot the bubbles and by 3 bubbels or more they wil remove and you get points
